Pre-Game Insights: Georgia and Greece are set to face off in the Euro 2024 qualifying playoff Path C semi-final
Georgia booked their ticket to the showpiece with a 2-0 beating of Luxembourg in their semi-final showdown
Greece hit Kazakhstan for five without reply in their semi-final
Team News: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia is eligible for selection once more after serving his suspension
Pantelis Hatzidiakos was taken off during the half-time interval in Greece's match against Kazakhstan but it was due to a tactical substitution as he was already on a booking
Lineups: Possible starting lineups for Georgia: Mamardashvili; Kvirkvelia, Dvali, Kashia; Kakabadze, Kiteishvili, Chakvetadze, Kochorashvili, Shengelia; Zivzivadze, Kvaratskhelia
Possible starting lineup for Greece: Vlachodimos; Baldock, Mavropanos, Hatzidiakos, Tsimikas; Bakasetas, Kourbelis, Mantalos; Masouras, Ioannidis, Pelkas
